Outside Providence

@ankit280: Amy is one of the prettiest actresses, no doubt about. I like watching her in movies, but  Outside Providence was released on VHS and on very hard to get DVD only, never was aired in times of HDTV nor released as BluRay.
I have my personal fav with Amy and Anne Faris (with single decent role of Ryan Reynolds in his life) - Just Friends from 2005. Incredible funny and best rendering of Brittney Spears from Anne Faris ever seen. That one I can encode and maybe I would find some DVDrip of Providence.

thank you man.. even a dvdrip would be great.. and yeah Just Friends is good too.. i have it but please encode for other Amy fans here
thanks again for the reply :)
